narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Wabash Center, Inc. is a Day Training, Developmentally Disabled Services provider based in Lafayette, IN. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $34.2M in Medicaid payments across 42K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $34.2M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
